title: Calorie to BTU Converter (cal, kcal, BTU, kJ)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: cal → J: \( J = \text{cal} \times 4.184 \) kcal → J: \( J = \text{kcal} \times 4184 \) BTU → J: \( J = \text{BTU} \times 1055.056 \) Energy conversion: convert source → joule → target. Power conversion: convert all to watt, using: 1 kcal/h = 4184 J / 3600 s = 1.163 W 1 BTU/h = 1055.056 J / 3600 s ≈ 0.293071 W

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
